sys_update_xml.name: sys_hub_flow_07376f15c328b2106d3433fc0501310b
sys_update_xml.payload:
publictruebrowserActivatedIn=chrome,integrationActivatedIn=standalone,labelCacheCleanUpExecuted=true,timeFromCreateToActivate=573635000,viewActivatedIn=naturalLanguage28100falseThis flow automates the approval and state transitions for the Mini Change Request process. When a change request is submitted for approval, it sends an approval task to the manager. If approved, the state moves to 'Implementation'; if rejected, it automatically closes the request.
